title: Midterm Cram (ft. Indivisible's María Urbina)
description:
In this bonus episode, A Closer Look supervising writer Sal Gentile and Late Night producer Henry Melcher catch up on the latest in the midterm races, notably the upset election of Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez in New York.

Their special guest is María Urbina, the national political director of Indivisible, a grassroots organizing effort for progressive candidates.
